promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute legendary deer electric-type pokemon wearing a lightning-charged crystal headband. It can be found in city-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or deer. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltalope, a a chibi cute legendary deer electric-type pokemon. It can be found in city-like environments It has the following abilities: G-Max Volt Tackle. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "deer", "electric" or "Voltalope". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, deer-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange galaxy background
generatedDescription: This elusive, adorable harbinger of lightning roams urban jungles, leaving sparks of joy in its wake. Witness G-Max Volt Tackle at your own risk.
